resources.string: Have full control over your image feed

Extension sends HTTP POST request with included Json as a body, but only if it\'s a valid Json, else it sends empty object `{}` and then replaces current images with the new ones. Muzei can be a little wonky at times, so after manual refresh, leave the source page and go back in again, to show newly fetched images.
